alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Lamb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 8:14PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bailey and southwestern Lamb Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 814 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of Bula, or 11 miles west of Littlefield, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sudan, Amherst and Bula. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
